title: Can i still get the Skin
body:
Hi i just saw the post on the league of legends page about how they were giving a free skin to us. I was wondering if I can still get it because I have had a chat restriction that also said i am ineligible to earn loot like key or chest fragments. Will this restriction not allow me to get the skin that riot is handing out? 

Thanks

replies.body:
As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, we're not restricting players from this gift unless they are below level 5 and haven't played a game within 60 days of [our announcement.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)

If you haven't received the gift by 9/23, please let me know.
I believe you should still get the free Riot Kayle skin. There's nothing in the announcement that states behavioral punishments make you ineligible, so you should be fine.
